Horneland gj√∏r overraskende valg: Slik stiller Rosenborg
David Akintola benkes, men det er ikke P√•l Andr√© Helland som tar plassen p√• h√∏yrekanten.
07 Nov 2019, 16:48 by Vegard Bjelland
LERKENDAL: Null poeng er fasit etter halvspilt gruppespill. Mens alle de andre lagene st√•r med poengfangst fra de tre f√∏rste kampene, har ikke Rosenborg klart det.
Uansett hvordan kveldens kamp g√•r vil Rosenborg bli liggende sist, men en seier mot Sporting vil holde liv i avansement-dr√∏mmen.
Eirik Horneland benker David Akintola i kveldens kamp, plassen tar Gjermund √Ösen.
Forrige gang Rosenborg vant en gruppespill-kamp i Europa League var 28. september 2017 mot Vardar. Etter dette har de spilt 13 kamper uten seier. Like foran med 15 kamper uten seier er Apollon Limassol. Kypriotene innehar rekorden for flest kamper p√• rad uten seier.

Sist d√∏de gresset: N√• venter den kaldeste Lerkendal-kvelden p√• ni √•r



Sportings stjernespiller Bruno Fernandes og resten av laget fikk testet ut Lerkendal-gresset onsdag kveld.üì∑ Christine Schefte

Tap i Lisboa
Rosenborg viste motstand da de tapte i Lisboa for to uker siden. Prestasjonen ga nok b√•de spillere og supportere tro p√• at Sporting CP absolutt er mulig √• sl√• p√• Lerkendal.
Det tok portugiserne 70 minutter √• overliste Andr√© Hansen. David Akintola hadde f√∏r m√•let en gedigen sjanse til √• sende RBK i ledelsen, men det ville seg ikke for kantspilleren.
Det var Yannick Bolasie som er p√• utl√•n fra Everton som scoret Sportings m√•l. Kantspilleren headet ballen via en uheldig Even Hovland f√∏r ballen gikk i m√•l bak en sjansel√∏s Andr√© Hansen.
PSV leder gruppen og st√•r med syv poeng, et poeng bak ligger Sporting, mens √∏sterikske Lask ligger nest sist med fire poeng.

Har sittet i Rosenborg-styret i 12 √•r. N√• gir han seg



Andr√© Hansen og Eirik Horneland etter tapet i Lisboa 24. oktober.üì∑ Kim Nygaard

Hornelands utvalgte
Rosenborg stiller med f√∏lgende lag (4‚Äì3‚Äì3): Andr√© Hansen - Vegar Eggen Hedenstad, Tore Reginiussen, Even Hovland, Birger Meling - Mike Jensen, Marius Lundemo, Anders Trondsen - Gjermund √Ösen, Alexander S√∏derlund, Samuel Adegbenro
Benken: Arild √òstb√∏, P√•l Andr√© Helland, David Akintola, Gustav Valsvik, Edvard Tagseth, Bj√∏rn Maars Johnsen og Emil Konradsen Ce√Øde.
text:
Horneland makes surprising choices: That's how Rosenborg puts it
David Akintola is benched, but it is not P√•l Andr√© Helland who takes the right-hand side.
07 Nov 2019, 16:48 by Vegard Bjelland
LERKENDAL: Zero points are missing after half-time group play. While all the other teams are scoring with points from the first three games, Rosenborg has not made it.
No matter how tonight's match goes, Rosenborg will be last, but a win against Sporting will keep the advancement dream alive.
Eirik Horneland benches David Akintola in tonight's game, the place takes Gjermund √Ösen.
The last time Rosenborg won a group game match in the Europa League was September 28, 2017 against Vardar. After that they have played 13 games without victory. Just ahead with 15 games without victory is Apollon Limassol. The Cypriots hold the record for most matches in a row without a win.

Last time the grass died: Now the coldest Lerkendal night is waiting for nine years



Sporting star player Bruno Fernandes and the rest of the team tested the Lerkendal grass Wednesday night. kv Christine Schefte

Losses in Lisbon
Rosenborg showed resistance when they lost in Lisbon two weeks ago. The performance probably gave both players and supporters the belief that Sporting CP is definitely possible to beat Lerkendal.
It took the Portuguese 70 minutes to outwit Andr√© Hansen. Before the goal, David Akintola had a good chance to send RBK into the lead, but that was not for the edge player.
It was Yannick Bolasie who is on loan from Everton who scored Sporting's goal. The head of the ball headed the ball through an unlucky Even Hovland before the ball went in behind a chanceless Andr√© Hansen.
PSV leads the group and stands with seven points, one point behind is Sporting, while Austrian Lask is next with four points.

Has served on the Rosenborg Board for 12 years. Now he gives up



Andr√© Hansen and Eirik Horneland after the loss in Lisbon on October 24. Kim Nygaard

Hornelands selected
Rosenborg poses with the following teams (4‚Äì3‚Äì3): Andr√© Hansen - Vegar Eggen Hedenstad, Tore Reginiussen, Even Hovland, Birger Meling - Mike Jensen, Marius Lundemo, Anders Trondsen - Gjermund √Ösen, Alexander S√∏derlund, Samuel Adegbenro
Bench: Arild √òstb√∏, P√•l Andr√© Helland, David Akintola, Gustav Valsvik, Edvard Tagseth, Bj√∏rn Maars Johnsen and Emil Konradsen Ce√Øde.
